author: Larry Irving, opinion contributor
title: Broadband is now our lifeline, but 20M still lack access
description: The internet is the one indispensable tool Americans have amidst this crisis.
content: The past month has taught us that the internet is the one indispensable tool Americans have amidst this crisis. Families are now depending on broadband internet connections for remote health diagnostics, for telework, for remote learning, to obtain public ser… [+4135 chars]
